Package com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.cmd

Object representations of IRC commands.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IncomingIrcCommand Identifies a command as one that can be received by a client from a server.
IrcCommand Object representation of an IRC command.
 

Class Summary
AbstractIrcCommand Some library methods facilitating validation in IRC commands.
CtcpCommand A message in the client-to-client protocol (CTCP).
InviteCommand A channel invitation command.
IrcNicknameCommand An IRC command that takes a nick (nickname) as parameter.
IrcTargetMessageCommand An IRC command that takes a target and a message.
IrcTargetsCommand An IRC command taking a list of targets as parameters.
JoinCommand A command to join a channel.
KickCommand A command to kick a user from a channel.
NickCommand A command to change IRC nicknames.
NoticeCommand An IRC notice.
PassCommand An IRC server password command.
PingCommand An IRC ping message.
PongCommand An IRC pong message.
PrivmsgCommand A private message on IRC.
QuitCommand A command to quit IRC.
SqueryCommand A query message sent to an IRC service.
UnknownCommand The fall-back type to use for unrecognized IRC commands.
UserCommand An IRC user identification command.
WhoisCommand A whois query.
 

Package com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.cmd Description

Object representations of IRC commands.
